article_title: Minus Taxes And Hype, $636 Million Jackpot Shrinks To $206 Million -- Or Less

article_metadata.description: Higher federal tax rates and a recent Mega Millions revamp that hypes the advertised value of the prize (compared to its real value), shrink the real value of the prize.
article_metadata.author: Janet Novack

og.description: Higher federal tax rates and a recent Mega Millions revamp that hypes the advertised value of the prize (compared to its real value), shrink the real value of the prize.
